about_the_game:
Catering robot goes out to the city and delivers! A simple and heartwarming delivery driving game.

◆Catering robot goes out to the town!
The game is a simple and heartwarming delivery driving game.

◆Pon-chan is in demand from various restaurants! Refuse any orders that aren't delicious!
The game rule is to aim for the specified score within a certain time. Find the order with high score! If the time limit is too tight or the unit price is too low, you can reject the order!

◆If you want to get more power, you can use "Chikara Station"!
You can get coins by completing orders. You can buy power-ups from the red vending machine "Chikara Station" in town!

◆Avoid the Ojama characters and keep your food safe!
Be careful of the cars in town and the guard robots in the area. If you bump into them, your food will be damaged and delivery may be impossible! If you hit them, your food will be damaged and you may not be able to deliver it...

◆Strategy and luck are the key to a high score!
If you power up, you can move at high speed and deliver multiple items at the same time. It is the key to a high score!

name: Delivery Pon-chan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Catering robot goes out to the city and delivers! A simple and heartwarming delivery driving game.
